00036 //----------------------------------------------------------
00037 GrTexGen::GrTexGen( unsigned int lod )
00038 : _inReflectGen( false )
00039 , _lod( Clamp( lod, 0U, 6U ) )
00040 {
00041         B_ASSERT( gGrTexGen == 0 );
00042         B_ASSERT( gGrRenderTargetMgr != 0 );
00043         gGrTexGen = this;
00044 
00046         GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format = GrTextureBase::EF_RGBA32; //gGrFramebuffer->IsHDR() ? GrTextureBase::EF_RGBA64F : GrTextureBase::EF_RGBA32;
00047 
00049         _white = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_WHITE );
00050 }

00054 {
00055         gGrTexGen = 0;

00065 GrTexGen::AddReflection( const GrMeshInst* meshInst, int range )
00066 {
00067         B_ASSERT( meshInst != 0 );
00068         Add( _reflections, meshInst, range );

00107 //----------------------------------------------------------
00108 void
00109 GrTexGen::GenReflections( const GrCamera* camera )
00110 {
00111         B_ASSERT( gGrScene != 0 );
00112         B_ASSERT( !_inReflectGen );
00113 
00116         _inReflectGen = true;
00117 
00119         bglFrontFace( GL_CW );
00120 
00122         GrRenderTarget* prevTarget = GrRenderTarget::GetCurrentRT();
00123         B_ASSERT( prevTarget != 0 );
00124 
00126         const unsigned int reflectionCount = _reflections.GetElemCount();
00127         unsigned int bestReflectiveObj = reflectionCount;
00128         MPlane reflectPlane;    
00129         MVec3 posOnPlane;
00130         float curDistSqr = FLT_MAX;
00131         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < reflectionCount; ++i )
00132         {
00134                 const SRenderTexture& reflection = _reflections[ i ];
00135         
00137                 if ( !camera->GetFrustum().IsOBoxInside( reflection.meshInst->GetRangeOBox( reflection.range ) ) )
00138                         continue;
00139 
00141                 reflection.meshInst->GetRangePlane( reflectPlane, posOnPlane, reflection.range );
00142                 posOnPlane += 0.05f * reflectPlane.GetNormal();
00143                 if ( reflectPlane.Dist( camera->GetPos() ) < 0.0f )
00144                         continue;
00145 
00147                 GrCamera reflectedCamera = camera->BuildReflectedCamera( reflectPlane );
00148 
00151                 GrMaterial* material = reflection.meshInst->GetMaterial( reflection.range );
00152                 ApplyTexture( material, GrTextureStage::kGenReflection, _white );
00153 
00155                 reflection.reflection->Bind();
00156 
00158                 gGrScene->RenderTexture( &reflectedCamera, posOnPlane );
00159 
00161                 ApplyTexture( material, GrTextureStage::kGenReflection, reflection.reflection->GetColorTex( 0 ) );
00162         }
00163 
00165         bglFrontFace( GL_CCW );
00166 
00168         prevTarget->Bind();
00169 
00171         _inReflectGen = false;
00172 }

00181 //----------------------------------------------------------
00182 void
00183 GrTexGen::ApplyTexture( GrMaterial* material, GrTextureStage::GenTextureFlag flag, URef< GrTextureBase > texture )
00184 {
00185         unsigned int passCount = material->GetPassCount();
00186         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < passCount; ++pass )
00187         {
00188                 GrMaterialPass* curPass = material->GetPass( pass );
00189                 for ( unsigned int stage = 0; stage < ES_COUNT; ++stage )
00190                 {
00192                         if ( curPass->GetStage( ( ESTAGE )stage ).GetGenTextureFlag() == flag )
00193                                 curPass->SetStageTexture( ( ESTAGE )stage, texture );
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 
00197         passCount = material->GetPostProcessPassCount();
00198         for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < passCount; ++pass )
00199         {
00200                 GrMaterialPass* curPass = material->GetPostProcessPass( pass );
00201                 for ( unsigned int stage = 0; stage < ES_COUNT; ++stage )
00202                 {
00204                         if ( curPass->GetStage( ( ESTAGE )stage ).GetGenTextureFlag() == flag )
00205                                 curPass->SetStageTexture( ( ESTAGE )stage, texture );
00206                 }
00207         }
00208 }

00210 //----------------------------------------------------------
00211 void
00212 GrTexGen::Add( RenderTextureList& rtList, const GrMeshInst* meshInst, int range )
00213 {
00214         B_ASSERT( meshInst != 0 );
00215 
00217         const unsigned int count = rtList.GetElemCount();
00218         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < count; ++i )
00219         {
00220                 if ( rtList[ i ].meshInst == meshInst && rtList[ i ].range == range )
00221                         return;
00222         }
00223 
00224         URef< GrRenderTarget > rt = BuildRenderTarget();
00225 
00227         SRenderTexture entry = 
00228         {
00229                 rt,
00230                 meshInst,
00231                 range,
00232         };
00233 
00235         rtList.Push( entry );
00236 }
00237 
00238 //----------------------------------------------------------
00239 void
00240 GrTexGen::Remove( RenderTextureList& rtList, const GrMeshInst* meshInst, int range )
00241 {
00242         const unsigned int count = rtList.GetElemCount();
00243         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < count; ++i )
00244         {
00245                 if ( rtList[ i ].meshInst == meshInst && rtList[ i ].range == range )
00246                 {
00247                         rtList.Erase( i );
00248                         return;
00249                 }
00250         }
00251 }
00252 
00253 //----------------------------------------------------------
00254 URef< GrRenderTarget >
00255 GrTexGen::BuildRenderTarget()
00256 {
00258 //      unsigned int width = gShWnd->GetWidth() >> _lod;
00259 //      unsigned int height = gShWnd->GetHeight() >> _lod;
00260         unsigned int width = 1024 >> _lod;
00261         unsigned int height = 1024 >> _lod;
00262         GrRenderTargetMgr::EFORMAT format = GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA32; //gGrFramebuffer->IsHDR() ? GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA64F : GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA32;
00263 
00265         URef< GrTextureBase > reflectTexture = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( width, height, format,
00266                 GrTextureBase::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_2D );
00267         URef< GrRenderbuffer > depthBuffer = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRenderbuffer( width, height, GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_DEPTH );
00268         URef< GrRenderTarget > reflection = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRenderTarget( reflectTexture, depthBuffer );
00269 
00271         return reflection;
00272 }
